name: Oh My Gosh! I Was Playing a Classic Platformer, But Then The Character Started Performing Actions All On His Own!
name_original: Oh My Gosh! I Was Playing a Classic Platformer, But Then The Character Started Performing Actions All On His Own!
description:
In this game (you won't believe this.) you play a classic platforming game, and then your character starts doing things on his own! Crazy, I know. And then you have to fight against him to regain control. Incredible pitch.

Features:

- All assets, visual and audio, were created by me (except two sound effects).

- A unique gameplay pitch, I guess?

- Control a cute character in a cute, simplistic world!

- It functions.

- I'm just a college student making a game in two days, give me a break.
